description: Find Airbnb stays by location, dates, guests, and price with precise filters. Get rich listing details, amenities, photos, and direct links to streamline booking decisions. Analyze listing photos and paginate through results to compare options quickly.

ignoreRobotsTxt.description: If set to true, the server will ignore robots.txt rules.

capabilities.name: airbnb_search
capabilities.description: Search for Airbnb listings with various filters and pagination. Provide direct links to the user

capabilities.name: airbnb_listing_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific Airbnb listing. Provide direct links to the user

capabilities.name: getListingPhotos
capabilities.description: Extract photo URLs from an Airbnb listing

capabilities.name: analyzeListingPhotos
capabilities.description: Analyze photos from an Airbnb listing
